product_name: Swix Sport X Over / Under Convertible Insulated Gloves
long_description: These insulated gloves have the unique benefit of having water- and windproof over-mitts stashed in their cuff pockets so you can up your weather protection on your cross-country adventures.
short_description: These insulated gloves have the unique benefit of having water- and windproof over-mitts stashed in their cuff pockets so you can up your weather protection on your cross-country adventures.
